column4: Hey, how do I get the codecs working on Totem so I can watch videos?
thanks
how do I get packages from the terminal?
thanks
thought that might be it but wasn't sure
hmm it can't find the package gstreamer0.10--fmpeg
*-ffmpeg
I thought I did on the repositories
where do I put them?
in most cases its safe to replace every edgy with hoary
just replace every instance of the work edgy with hoary
you need to update apt first -- run this -- sudo aptitude update
it means you have two enries in sources.list pointing to the same location
hold up
-- this is exactly what your sources.list should look like -- http://pastebin.ca/289687
numbers??
you mean the line numbers on the left?? no no, they shouldnt be included
did you update apt afterwards?
I just searched http://packages.ubuntu.com for gstreamer0.10-ffmpeg -- it seems it is not included on hoary
